articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Unhasu Concert
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Unhasu Concert
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, enjoyed the Unhasu concert being given at the People's Theatre here on the occasion of May Day.
					 The audience, who had been waiting for the start of the concert, broke into the rousing cheers of "hurrah" with tears of emotion when Kim Jong Un appeared in the auditorium unexpectedly.
					
					 The concert began with the playing of the national anthem. Its numbers included mixed chorus "May, Month of Victory", male solo "Chollima Gallops Forward", female solo "For Another Great Surge under the Uplifted Banner of Self-reliance" and orchestra "We Will Never Forget".
					
					 The hero sportspersons who won gold medals at the 30th Olympic Games and workers of the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory also mounted the stage and sang songs "What Did We Cherish Deep in Our Hearts" and "Boundless Is Our Yearning" with deep emotion.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the glorious history of the struggle in which the Korean people worked world-startling miracles from debris after the war and paved a wide avenue for prosperity despite difficulties and trials under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men and a bright future of the great Paektusan nation advancing under the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized when orchestra and mixed chorus "The Dear Home in My Native Village" and female solo and mixed chorus "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms", in particular, were presented. The artistes sang those songs again in response to the repeated encores.
					
					 The concert ended with mixed chorus "The Leader and the General Are Together."
					
					 Kim Jong Un, reflecting the feelings of the audience, requested the artistes to repeat the songs "The Dear Home in My Native Village" and "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms."
					
					 He warmly congratulated the artistes, expressing great satisfaction over their splendid performance which is distinct in its ideological and thematic content and style and represents the ardent aspiration and desire, high awareness and determination of the Korean people.
					
					 Appreciating the Unhasu Orchestra as outpost and reliable agitator on the ideological front of the WPK, he extended thanks to it in the name of the First Secretary of the WPK.
					
					 The Unhasu concert marking May Day instills the spirit of defending the socialist country, the will to annihilate the enemies, faith in victory and optimism into the army and people with its might as powerful as a nuclear bomb, he noted, adding it is an excellent concert electrifying the audience and fully reflecting the revolutionary stand and principle of the DPRK.
					
					 Noting "The Dear Home in My Native Village", a wartime song strong in philosophical nature and full of patriotism, was excellently represented in the spirit of the era, he said the service personnel and people of the DPRK would turn out in a decisive battle, singing such wartime songs once the second June 25 war breaks out on this land.
					
					 "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms" is a very good song which one wishes to listen again and again, he said, adding: This song fully reflects our principled stand toward the enemies who haven't dropped their wicked design to stifle our socialist country.
					
					 Thanks to such revolutionary and militant songs as "The Dear Home in My Native Village" and "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms", our service personnel and people will win only victory in their final decisive battle against the enemies, he stressed.
					
					 He expressed his expectation and belief that the creators and artistes of the orchestra would powerfully encourage the army and people through creation of arts and performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Hwang Pyong So, Kang Phil Hun, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon and Jon Chang Bok, Pyongyangites and local people of different strata staying in the capital city.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Sites
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Construction Sites 
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made field survey of the construction sites of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Service personnel are building the war museum into a splendid monumental edifice. 
					
					 Officials and workers in the field of the capital city construction are pushing ahead with the construction of the cemetery  in the spirit of winning victory in the all-out standoff with the U.S., in hearty response to the decision of the historic March, 2013  Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Going round the construction sites of the museum and cemetery that have appeared as magnificent edifices thanks to the spirit of "At one go" and indomitable mental power of the builders, the premier learned in detail about the construction. 
					
					 A consultative meeting of officials concerned took place on the spot. 
					
					 The premier stressed the importance of the construction of the museum and cemetery. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of providing cement, structural steel and other materials and equipment necessary for the construction.

articles.title: Greetings to Polish Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Polish Foreign Minister
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greeting to his Polish counterpart Radoslaw Sikorski on May 3 on the constitutional day, the national day of Poland. 
					 The message expressed belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would develop in the mutual interests of the peoples of the two countries this year marking the 65th anniversary of the opening of diplomatic ties.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation, Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation, Players Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Korean People's Army headed by Kang Phyo Yong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and DPRK players back home on Friday respectively. The delegation visited African countries and the players took part in the 8th Asian Acrobatic Gymnastics Championship.

articles.title: Remains of Pak Hui Dok Buried in Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Remains of Pak Hui Dok Buried in Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The remains of Pak Hui Dok were laid in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery. He was adviser to the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and twice Labor Hero.
					 Pak devoted himself to the development of the movement of Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and the prosperity of the homeland till the last moments of his life from the early days of Chongryon, true to the idea and leadership of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un made sure that he would always be remembered.
					
					 A burial ceremony took place at the cemetery on Friday. 
					
					 Present there were Kim Yang Gon, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Jin Guk, director of the Bureau of Service for Overseas Compatriots, and officials of institutions related to overseas Koreans.
					
					 Also present there were Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan staying in the socialist homeland and the family of the deceased.
					
					 Kim Yong Dae made a funeral address.
					
					 Pak's remains were buried in the cemetery amid the playing of the funeral music.
					
					 Senior party and state officials and the family covered his grave with earth.
					
					 A wreath sent by Kim Jong Un was laid before his grave.
					
					 Placed before it were wreaths in the name of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan and institutions related to overseas Koreans.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Pak.

articles.title: Seminar on New Strategic Line Held
articles.content:
Seminar on New Strategic Line Held 
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the line of simultaneously building up the economy and nuclear forces took place at Kim Il Sung University some days ago. The line was set forth by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the historic March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Presented at the seminar were some papers on the validity of the line.
					
					 The president of Kim Il Sung University, Thae Hyong Chol, in his paper said: 
					
					 Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's line on simultaneously building up the economy and nuclear forces serves as a guarantee for achieving national reunification and finishing the building of a thriving socialist nation at an earliest date.
					
					 It is the only choice for the DPRK to get access to nukes in order to deter the U.S. nuclear threat and achieve national reunification. Only when the country beefs up the nuclear striking power in every conceivable way, is it possible to overpower all sorts of hostile forces under the U.S. nuclear umbrella.
					
					 The line is eternal guidelines for defending the nation's sovereignty and dignity. They can be defended only on the strength of military power.
					
					 In particular, the nuclear armed forces are the most reliable and mighty means for defending the nation's sovereignty and dignity in the present-day era when the imperialists openly threaten other countries with nukes.    This is truth shown by tragedies in Libya and several other countries.
					
					 Ju Chang Il, dean of the Faculty of Philosophy of the University, said:
					
					 The new line is most scientific as it correctly reflects the situation prevailing in the country and the requirements of the developing revolution.
					
					 Beefing up nuclear armed forces is the only way to avert a nuclear war and secure peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK's nukes serve as powerful means for self-defence and peace. Nobody can dare to provoke the DPRK for fear of its nukes. It is considered to be a universal truth that nations with nukes have no other choice but to seek peaceful co-existence.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that international laws have so far been adopted in favor of nuclear powers. Justice turns to be injustice in accordance with the U.S. perspective. It lays hurdles to economic development and growth of those countries refusing to follow it and labels those calling for sovereignty and principle as "criminals" and "evils".
					
					 Not a few UN bodies, whose mission is to ensure sovereign rights and security of their member nations, have turned into marionettes of the imperialist forces, yielded to their high-handed practices.
					
					 As a nuclear weapons state, the DPRK has been able to determinedly challenge the U.S. that is styling itself the "only superpower in the world".
					
					 Rim Yong Chol, a section chief of Pyongyang Agricultural College of the University, said:
					
					 The new strategic line is a succession of the line of simultaneously carrying on the economic construction and defence buildup, as it represents the principle of independence, the principle of Songun (military-first) politics and the ideal of socialism.
					
					 It fully conforms to the requirements of the present era in which the DPRK is energetically stepping up the building of a thriving nation, in acute confrontation with the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hails New Line of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hails New Line of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The new line of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force serves as a strategic line to be held fast permanently to cope with the imperialists' consistent nuclear threat and arbitrary practices.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 Nearly seven decades have passed since the appearance of the first nuclear weapon on the earth, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This historic era was mainly characterized by the fact that access to nukes decided the position of a power and nuclear powers built the structure of hegemony.
					
					 The nuclear powers are working hard to permanently maintain the present order favorable for their domination and interests.
					
					 The U.S. and other nuclear powers seeking "unipolar world" have conflicting national interests and ideas.
					
					 They are, however, cooperating with each other and desperately preventing other countries from having access to nukes though they are their old friends and their life and death depend on this access.
					
					 They claim that nuclear non-proliferation is aimed at global peace and stability. However, a lot of wars and interference in the internal affairs of other countries were perpetrated by nuclear powers including the U.S. since the end of the Second World War.
					
					 Nuclear powers failed to protect peace and stability of those countries under their nuclear umbrella.
					
					 If the anti-imperialist and independent countries and small countries are to protect their sovereignty and achieve progress in the present world, they should build up their own strength so that no one can provoke. To this end, they have no other option but to build self-supporting economic potential and powerful nuclear force.
					
					 The new line of the WPK clearly indicated the way of glorifying the dignity of the country and achieving prosperity in the present world dominated by nuclear powers.

articles.title: Denuclearization of U.S. and World Is Prerequisite to That of Korean Peninsula: Newspaper
articles.content:
Denuclearization of U.S. and World Is Prerequisite to That of Korean Peninsula: Newspaper
						
 Pyongyang May 3 (KCNA) -- The Korean Peninsula can never be denuclearized before the world including the U.S. is denuclearized. This is the DPRK's principled stance on the issue. Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a bylined article.
					 It continues:
					
					 Lurking behind the U.S. rhetoric about the issue of the denuclearization of the peninsula is an ulterior intention to force the DPRK to dismantle its nukes and realize the U.S. scenario for invading the DPRK with ease.
					
					 The U.S. was the only country which used nukes and it is none other than Washington that seeks to dominate the world with its nukes.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is working hard to realize its scenario to threaten and blackmail all other countries with nukes and put the whole world under its control at any cost, it is an exercise of the right to self-defense to react to it in kind.
					
					 The world can be peaceful only when the U.S. dismantles all its nukes and gives up its intention to invade other countries. 
					
					 U.S. President Obama once advocated "a world without nuclear weapons" but this remains an empty talk.
					
					 The Strategic Arms Limitation Treaty was concluded between Russia and the U.S. several years back. This, however, was not for denuclearization but for reducing nukes.
					
					 This treaty allows both sides to have about 1 500 nukes each. But it is hard to guess whether this treaty would be implemented as the U.S. usually does not keep its promise.
					
					 The U.S. is stepping up the development and modernization of nukes under the signboard of nuclear disarmament.
					
					 These facts indicate how hypocritical the U.S. call for "a world without nuclear weapons" and "a denuclearized world" is.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on World Progressives to Shatter U.S. Hard-line Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on World Progressives to Shatter U.S. Hard-line Policy 
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- A genuine way to be followed by the world progressives who love justice and peace is to resolutely shatter the hard-line policy of the U.S., says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a by-lined article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which fabricates unjust resolutions to stifle independent countries in the international arena including the UN under the pretext of establishment of a "new world order" and unhesitatingly ignites wars of aggression against other countries. 
					
					 If the U.S. highhanded and arbitrary practices are allowed and some countries follow it, the world will be under the reign of the law of jungle and its people will suffer greater misfortune and pain. 
					
					 The act of following the American-style highhanded practices is little short of pushing the world to crimes and death. 
					
					 Since the U.S. emerged as the "only superpower in the world" after the demise of the Cold War, its arbitrary practices have reached an extreme phase. 
					
					 In pursuit of world domination, the U.S. has unhesitatingly persisted in its highhanded practices against those countries desirous of independence against imperialism in disregard of international law and the missions and roles of international bodies for the mere reason their ideologies and social systems are different from it. 
					
					 The U.S. poses the biggest danger to the efforts to achieve global peace, stability, development and prosperity. 
					
					 To blindly follow the U.S. brigandish and highhanded practices leads to self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities to Blame for Crisis in KIZ: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities to Blame for Crisis in KIZ: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is persistently pulling up the DPRK over the responsibility for the crisis in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) now in the danger of its closure.
					 A spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Unification in a press conference on April 22 urged the north to remain true to the inter-Korean agreement, blustering that damages to the businesses of the south side are increasing due to the measure taken by the north to restrict the entry.
					
					 The chief of Chongwadae in a recent meeting of senior secretaries said that the DPRK is to blame for the crisis in the KIZ.
					
					 This is a crafty ploy to cover up their criminal act of having derailed the inter-Korean economic cooperation.
					
					 The KIZ is a precious product of the June 15 joint declaration as it was built after the DPRK granted a privilege to Jong Ju Yong, honorary chairman of Hyundai Group of south Korea, valuing his patriotic will for reunification.
					
					 The DPRK offered the militarily sensitive area to the south side for its business activities as the former earnestly hoped to see the KIZ serve as a foundation for national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 That is why the DPRK made every sincere effort to keep the operations in the KIZ afloat at any cost even when traitor Lee Myung Bak severed all inter-Korean relations through escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north after coming to power.
					
					 Under such tense situation that a war may break out any moment the KIZ has miraculously stood. This would be unthinkable without the DPRK's self-sacrificing efforts for the interests common to the nation and peace and prosperity.
					
					 However, the south Korean confrontation maniacs desperately disturbed normal operations in the KIZ and its development, describing it as a "money source" of the DPRK.
					
					 They even planted tricksters and spies among south side's business persons and workers entering the KIZ in a base bid to bring down the social system of the DPRK.
					
					 Intolerable was the fact that the south Korean warmongers revealed their attempt to hurl aggression forces into the KIZ under the pretext of "hostage rescue" operation.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the puppet forces are working hard to turn the sacred KIZ into a theatre of confrontation and source of a war against the north, not a zone for reconciliation and unity.
					
					 It was quite natural for the DPRK to have taken resolute countermeasures in this regard.
					
					 The puppet regime is getting frantic in its moves to have the KIZ closed by withdrawing all south side's personnel from it. It is now busy passing the buck for this crisis to the north, a behavior reminiscent of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 With no rhetoric can the south Korean regime evade the responsibility for this crisis.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Brigandish Demand for DPRK's Dismantlement of Nuclear Weapons
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Brigandish Demand for DPRK's Dismantlement of Nuclear Weapons 
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Council for Independent and Peaceful Reunification of the Nation in south Korea released a statement on April 25 accusing the U.S. of unreasonably demanding the north dismantle its nuclear weapons.
					 The U.S. hurled huge nuclear strategic weapons into the joint military exercises with south Korea, straining the situation to the maximum, the statement said.
					
					 It condemned the U.S. for staging all forms of nuclear war drills in south Korea, constantly threatening the north. This compelled the north to start nuclear development according to its policy of nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 It is quite natural for the north to opt for developing nuclear weapons to stand up against the moves for a nuclear war against the north for over half a century, it noted, and continued:
					
					 However, the U.S. is insisting that the north should abandon its nuclear weapons. This is nothing but brigandish logic that it should raise a white flag.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants peace, it should conclude a peace treaty with the north immediately, withdraw all its nuclear weapons and forces from south Korea and opt for denuclearizing the world.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Action Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Action Staged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- An action took place in Seoul, south Korea on May Day to denounce the puppet regime's unpopular rule, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 More than 10 000 members of the Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally at the Seoul Plaza under the slogan of "Declare right, shout an equal world!"
					
					 The ralliers in a declaration on the right accused the capitalists of trampling down the right of workers by means of hiring.
					
					 It is deplorable that workers are liable to lose their jobs and to be thrown to street from the moment they call for their rights, they said.
					
					 They branded the present "government" as a regime utterly indifferent to workers.
					
					 They declared they would conduct a dynamic action for the abolition of part-time job, wage hike, etc.
					
					 Then a declaration for the right to solidarity of youth and children, the disabled, the urban poor and petty tradesmen was read out.
					
					 The Public Transport Workers Union, the Government Employees Union, the Public Health and Medical Workers Union and other organizations under the confederation held rallies and staged demonstrations in different parts of Seoul.
					
					 Meanwhile, civic and public organizations held rallies and staged sit-in strikes in demand of the vital rights of the workers.
					
					 That day the fascist authorities hurled at least 5 000-strong police forces of 67 companies into different parts of the city, kicking up a terror-ridden atmosphere.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Special Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Special Drills
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are staging madcap special drills to stifle the DPRK in Yongchon, North Kyongsang Province, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 This was announced by the Second Operation Command of the puppet army Thursday.
					
					 The drills are being staged under the simulated condition of someone's "infiltration". They activated the 201st commando brigade belonging to the Second Operation Command.
					
					 The warmongers have increased the period of the drills to four weeks from one to two weeks in the past. They are mobile, search, reconnaissance and firing drills in mountainous areas.
					
					 They blustered that such special drills will be expanded to all units of the Second Operation Command from next year.

articles.title: Koreans in China Urge U.S., S. Korean Warmongers to Stop Acting Rashly
articles.content:
Koreans in China Urge U.S., S. Korean Warmongers to Stop Acting Rashly 
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on April 30 in support of the April 24 information bulletin of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					 The statement recalled that the CPRK Secretariat in its information bulletin urged the U.S. and south Korean warmongers to stop at once the north-targeted war maneuvers and discontinue all hostile acts and provocations against the DPRK if they do not want self-destruction.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers staged combined landing drill (Ssangyong drill), joint coastal amphibious logistic drill, emergency runaway take-off and landing drill and the like in south Korea as part of the Foal Eagle joint military exercises despite the censure and condemnation at home and abroad, it said, adding: They opened the drills to public, kicking up anti-north war hysteria.
					
					 When their deceptive offer of dialogue did not work on the DPRK, the brigandish U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers opened the war drills to public in a bid to put pressure on it.
					
					 The officials of the association and all other Koreans in China warn the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers not to run wild any longer, the statement declared.
					
					 Victory will be in store for the Korean people as long as there are the single-mindedly united service personnel and people and the invincible elite Paektusan army ready to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists in the showdown with them, it stressed.

articles.title: U.S. Highhanded, Arbitrary Practices under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Highhanded, Arbitrary Practices under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Chil Song, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, in his recent article blasted the U.S. highhanded and arbitrary practices in the world.
					 The U.S.-led imperialists are pursuing double-standard policy in the international community and forcing other countries to accept their lifestyle in wanton violation of international conventions, the article said.
					
					 The imperialist forces are oblivious of the historic lesson that the fascists sought world hegemony during World War II and what consequences it entailed, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 Proceeding from its avaricious ambition for domination over Northeast Asia, the U.S. has pursued its policy of aggression towards the DPRK while keeping south Korea geo-politically favorable to it under long military occupation. 
					
					 The U.S. has never abandoned its geo-political ambition to turn the Korean Peninsula into a military springboard for decades. This is clearly evidenced by the military drills being staged with south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. keeps huge armed forces in south Korea, having the prerogative of the supreme command over the south Korean puppet army in its hands. It has always targeted the DPRK in a bid to mount a preemptive nuclear strike on it with nuclear missiles, etc.
					
					 The U.S. is keen to brand the DPRK as "rogue state sponsoring international terrorism" but the U.S. is, indeed, an international terrorist state.
					
					 The wars of aggression fought by the U.S. in Afghanistan and Iraq go to fully prove that it is pursuing its hegemonic ambition against the whole world.
					
					 The U.S. has perpetrated too many highhanded and arbitrary practices in the world to cite.

articles.title: Russians and Ukrainians Stage May Day Demonstrations Holding Photos of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Russians, Ukrainians Stage May Day Demonstrations with Photos of Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Young people in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia made the May Day demonstration on Wednesday, holding photos of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					 Demonstrators including members of the communist youth league shouted "Kim Jong Un!", "Kim Jong Un!" marching through Nepski Avenue. 
					
					 Voice of Russia reported this news on Thursday, saying:
					
					 It is an obvious fact that young leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un is praised as a famous man at present by Russians. 
					
					 In particular, his indomitable will against the U.S. imperialists serves as a model of the progressive people. 
					
					 That day the Russian internet APN reported the same news with his photo under the title "Leader of DPRK Kim Jong Un has become the hero of the May Day demonstration held in Sankt-Peterburg". 
					
					 An internet website of Dnepropetrovsk, Ukraine on Wednesday posted news saying that the photos of Kim Jong Un appeared in the May Day demonstration held in the city, drawing attention of many people.

articles.title: Society for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Inaugurated in Russia
articles.content:
Society for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Inaugurated in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Rostov Society for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Russia was inaugurated on April 21 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Ziyachenko Victor Anatoliyevich, first secretary of the Rostov Regional Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolshevik, was elected chairman of the society.

articles.title: Exploits Performed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il in Army Building Introduced by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Exploits Performed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il in Army Building Introduced by Foreign Media
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Media of Guinea, Nigeria and Bangladesh carried special write-ups or aired special programs in the period between April 22 and 24 to mark the 81st anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The Guinean Domestic Broadcasting Service said in a special program titled "Invincible Korean People's Army": 
					
					 The invincible might of the KPA is now drawing the attention of the international community as it has firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and nation and victoriously advanced the cause of socialism with arms.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of the KPA, was a legendary brilliant commander who defeated the two formidable imperialist enemies in one generation.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il, great successor to the President, was a peerlessly brilliant commander who achieved victory in the war without gunfire fought against the imperialists with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 The KPA is now under Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The KPA will always win victory under his leadership.
					
					 The international and seven national languages broadcasting services of the country aired the similar program.
					
					 The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer in an article titled "Option of the DPRK" recalled that the DPRK declared decisive physical countermeasures against the provocative moves of the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper The Daily Folk also carried an article introducing the proud history of the Korean revolutionary armed forces which have won victories thanks to the great Songun brilliant commanders.

articles.title: DPRK's Measures on KIZ Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK's Measures on KIZ Supported by Swiss Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on April 27 supporting the statement released by the spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Noting the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) is a precious product of the June 15 era of reunification brought about by the efforts of the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 The south Korean regime is to wholly blame for the danger of the impending collapse of the KIZ.
					
					 Nevertheless, it went the lengths of releasing an "ultimatum-like statement" making a mockery of the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean regime should bear in mind that it is to blame for the deteriorating inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Whether the KIZ will be totally closed or not hinges on the behavior of the chief of Chongwadae and her minions.
					
					 We fully support all the measures taken by the DPRK including the statement of the spokesman for the NDC Policy Department.

articles.title: British Organizations Urge U.S. to Comply with DPRK's Demands
articles.content:
British Organizations Urge U.S. to Comply with DPRK's Demands 
						
 Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on April 20. In the statement they urged the U.S. to comply with the demands of the DPRK if it stands for peace.
					 Otherwise it will become clear that the U.S. doesn't truly stand for peace but seeks invasion of the DPRK, it said, adding:
					
					 "Dialogue" touted by the U.S. and south Korea is nothing but a broad hoax aimed at unilateral disarmament of the DPRK and collapse of its Juche-oriented socialist system.
					
					 Any dialogue is possible only on the principle of equality and respect for sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 We support the statement of the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly know that the DPRK is different from those countries which allowed unprincipled compromise with the imperialists, harboring an illusion about "peace" touted by them.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre campos de construccion de museo conmemorativo y cementerio
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre campos de construccion de museo conmemorativo y cementerio  
						
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros Pak Pong Ju recorrio los campos de construccion del Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y el cementerio de martires del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					  Los militares del EPC desarrollan con dinamismo una campana para construir magnificamente el museo como edificio monumental.
					
					  Y los funcionarios y los obreros de la rama de la construccion capitalina crean cada dia los milagros e innovaciones en la construccion del cementerio de martires del EPC con el entusiasmo de terminar con la victoria brillante el enfrentamiento total con Estados Unidos en acato a la decision del historico pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					  El premier se entero en detalles del estado de la obra recorriendo los campos de construccion del Museo y el cementerio que se construyen por el impetu de un tiron y el poderio espiritual indoblegable de los constructores.
					
					  En el terreno se realizo la reunion de consulta de los funcionarios de la rama interesada.
					
					  Pak apunto la importancia de la construccion del Museo Conmemorativo y el cementerio de martires.
					
					  En la reunion fueron abordadas las medidas para suministrar suficientemente el cemento, el acero y otros materiales y equipos necesarios a la obra.

articles.title: Publicados articulos sobre nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo
articles.content:
Publicados articulos sobre nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo 
						
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco tuvo lugar el simposio de la Universidad Kim Il Sung sobre la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares presentada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el historico pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  En la ocasion fueron publicadas varias disertaciones que argumentan la justicia de dicha linea.
					
					  El rector de este plantel docente, Thae Hyong Chol (59 anos de edad), senalo en su articulo que la linea de desarrollo paralelo presentada por el Mariscal es la revolucionaria invencible que permite llevar a feliz termino en el mas corto tiempo la causa de la reunificacion de la patria y la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y prosiguio:
					
					  Para lograr la gran causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria rechazando rotundamente la amenaza nuclear de Estados Unidos, tenemos que poseer sin duda el poderoso medio de represalia, o sea las armas nucleares fortalecidas en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo.
					
					  Solo cuando fortalezcamos por todos los medios la capacidad de ataque nuclear tomando la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares como estrategia permanente de la revolucion,  podemos rechazar de un golpe a todas las fuerzas hostiles que actuan con imprudencia bajo el paraguas nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					  La nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo es la guia eterna para exaltar a todo el mundo y defender firmemente la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion.
					
					  La soberania y dignidad de la nacion no se determinan por el dinero o el bien ni se defienden por la ilusion o la obediencia a otro pais.
					
					  Ellas son la vida de la nacion que puede defenderse solo con las inagotables y potentes fuerzas de autodefensa.
					
					  En el mundo actual en que las maniobras de escision nacional de los imperialistas se tornan cada dia mas graves y se comete abiertamente el chantaje nuclear de las fuerzas reaccionarias tendente a convertir en los esclavos de version moderna a otras naciones, las fuerzas armadas nucleares son la mas confiable y poderosa garantia para defender la soberania y dignidad de la nacion.
					
					  Esto es el principio de la historia que demuestra el estado tragico ocurrido en Libia y otros paises en los ultimos anos.
					
					  El decano de la Facultad de Filosofia, Ju Chang Il (52 anos de edad), apunto que la nueva linea del desarrollo paralelo es la mas cientifica que refleja exactamente la demanda legitima de la situacion dada y la revolucion en desarrollo y continuo:
					
					  La garantia real para prevenir la guerra nuclear y defender la paz en la Peninsula Coreana tambien reside en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					  Nuestras fuerzas armadas nucleares son las fuerzas poderosas de la autodefensa y el medio potente para el aseguramiento de la paz.
					
					  Gracias a contar con el disuasivo nuclear, nadie intenta atreverse a burlar el destino de la nacion coreana y nosotros hemos convertido en el pais y la nacion poderosos.
					
					  En el mundo actual se considera como verdad universal el que entre los paises poseedores de las armas nucleares, no se puede menos que buscar el remedio de la coexistencia pacifica.
					
					  No es mucho decir que desde el fin de la Segunda Guerra Mundial hasta la fecha el orden del mundo se ha controlado de hecho por las potencias poseedoras de las armas nucleares.
					
					  Segun los intereses de las potencias fue establecido el orden del mundo, la justicia se convierte en la injusticia por la interpretacion al estilo estadounidense, se restringen el desarrollo y el crecimiento de los paises que no obedecen ni adulan a los paises grandes y se califica de "crimen" y "mal" si dicen sobre la independencia y los principios.
					
					  Esto es la realidad del actual mundo lleno de contradicciones.
					
					  Especialmente hasta las organizaciones de la ONU que deben tomar como su mision el aseguramiento de los derechos independientes y la seguridad de los paises miembros ante la coaccion y la arbitrariedad de las brutales fuerzas imperialistas, se convierten en los aparatos titeres.
					
					  Gracias a poseer las armas nucleares, nuestro pais abrio el orificio en la estructura politica del mundo centrada en las potencias nucleares y llego a enfrentarse dignamente a EE.UU. que se autodenomina como "unica superpotencia" en el mundo.
					
					  El jefe de seccion del Instituto Superior de Agricultura de Pyongyang, Rim Yong Chol (50 anos de edad), subrayo que la nueva linea estrategica es la brillante sucesion y desarrollo  de la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de defensa nacional en que se materializaron el principio de independencia, el del Songun y el ideal del socialismo y prosiguio:
					
					  La nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo es la estrategica que profundizo la linea para desarrollar paralelamente la construccion economica y la defensa nacional conforme a la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo y la condicion de la epoca actual en que se libra mas agudamente el enfrentamiento total con EE.UU. y avanzamos con pasos firmes hacia la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					  Durante casi 70 anos despues de la apariencia de las armas nucleares en la Tierra, la guerra fria continuo en escala mundial y las guerras grandes y pequenas se realizaron en varias regiones, pero solo los paises poseedores de las armas nucleares no fueron invadidos en lo militar por otro pais.
					
					  Este hecho historico y la condicion real en que EE.UU.,  mayor poseedor de las armas nucleares en el mundo, ejerce constantemente la amenaza nuclear a nuestro pais, comprueban que el disuasivo nuclear poderoso es el medio fisico mas potente y el remedio invencible para defender la soberania del pais y la nacion, prevenir la guerra y garantizar la paz.

articles.title: Enterrados restos de difunto Pak Hui Dok en Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos
articles.content:
Enterrados restos de difunto Pak Hui Dok en Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedaron enterrados en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos los restos del difunto Pak Hui Dok, ex asesor de la Federacion de Comerciantes e Industriales Coreanos Residentes en Japon, quien fue tambien el diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y doble Heroe del Trabajo.
					Pak hizo aporte al movimiento de los coreanos residentes en Japon, al fortalecimiento de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) y a la construccion de la patria prospera desde el inicio de la constitucion de la Chongryon hasta el ultimo momento de su vida en pleno acato a la idea y direccion de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un hizo que Pak quede siempre en la memoria de la patria.
					
					La ceremonia de enterramiento se efectuo el dia 3 en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos.
					
					Estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yang Gon, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS, Kim Yong Dae, el director de Atencion a los Compatriotas en Extranjero, Kim Jin Guk y otros funcionarios de los organos correspondientes.
					
					Tambien asistieron los funcionarios de la Chongryon, los compatriotas residentes en Japon y los familiares del difunto, quienes permanecen en la patria socialista.
					
					Kim Yong Dae hizo uso de la palabra de pesame.
					
					Fueron enterrados los restos del difunto en medio de la interpretacion del canto funebre.
					
					Los cuadros del partido y el Estado y los familiares del difunto tomaron parte en el enterramiento.
					
					Quedo colocada ante el sepulcro una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales a nombre del Presidium del Comite Central de la Chongryon, la Federacion de Comerciantes e Industriales Coreanos en Japon y los demas organos interesados.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto.

articles.title: Responsabilidad de estado de ZIK recae sobre autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Responsabilidad de estado de ZIK recae sobre autoridades surcoreanas
						
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos siguen acusando a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en cuanto a la Zona Industrial de Kaesong que se halla en visperas del cierre total.
					En rueda de prensa concedida el 22 del mes pasado, el vocero del Ministerio de Unificacion dijo que se agrandan los danos de las empresas surcoreanas debido a la medida tomada por la parte Norte para restringir el transito y que esta debe ser fiel a los acuerdos intercoreanos.
					
					En la reciente reunion de jefes de secretarios, la duena de Chongwadae argumento que la parte Norte es el responsable del estado de la ZIK.
					
					Tal proceder es una astuta artimana para encubrir sus crimenes de haber llevado al fracaso la cooperacion economica intercoreana.
					
					La RPDC aprecio el alma patriotica pro-reunificacion de Jong Ju Yong, presidente honorario del Grupo Hyundai del Sur de Corea, y le concedio los favores especiales. Asi fue construida la ZIK, que es el valioso fruto de la epoca del 15 de junio.
					
					Con el unico deseo de que la ZIK se convierta en la base de reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion nacional, la parte Norte cedio esa zona militarmente sensible para las actividades economicas de la parte surena.
					
					Por eso, cuando durante su mandato el traidor Lee Myung Bak interrumpio totalmente las relaciones intercoreanas enfrascandose a la confrontacion fratricida, la parte Norte hizo todo lo posible para mantenerla en funcionamiento.
					
					Al margen de los esfuerzos abnegados de la RPDC para el interes, la paz y la prosperidad comunes de la nacion, es imposible pensar en el hecho de que la ZIK vino manteniendose milagrosamente bajo la actual situacion aguda en visperas de guerra.
					
					Pero, los maniacos conflictivos surcoreanos insultaron la ZIK como "fuente de ingreso" de la parte Norte y obstaculizaron persistentemente su gestion y desarrollo normales.
					
					Y hasta infiltraron a los conspiradores y agentes entre los empresarios y obreros surcoreanos que entraban en la zona y se valieron de todas las maneras para derrocar nuestro regimen.
					
					Lo intolerable es que los belicistas surcoreanos pusieron al desnudo su intencion de introducir en la citada zona las fuerzas armadas agresivas hablando de la llamada operacion de "rescate de rehenes".
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran claramente que los titeres tratan de convertir la ZIK no en la base de reconciliacion y la unidad sino en el campo de confrontacion y fuente de guerra de agresion al Norte.
					
					Son muy justas las contramedidas de la RPDC tomadas frente a ellos.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no podran liberarse jamas de la responsabilidad del estado de la ZIK que se encuentra en una fase del cierre total.
